INTRODUCTION
The NAEB Tape Network came into being in January of 1950 when the
series, WE HUMAN BEINGS, was offered to 19 stations® In January of
1951 the headquarters of the tape netssork operation was moved from "WHIG,
in Hew York, to the University of I3.1inoi s® There it was operated
under the guidance of the Division of Communications® In June of 195)1

To indicate fully the progress made by the tape network, this
report summarises its activities from the beginning in January* 1950,
